social_issues: Employee morale issues due to managerial dishonesty and unethical practices
Labor shortages and challenges in retaining skilled workers
governance_issues: Ethical concerns related to managerial practices and employee treatment

sources.title: How do supply chain disruptions lead to contract disputes?
sources.snippet: Supply chain disruptions have become a big problem for businesses in recent years. These disruptions make it hard for companies to meet their contract promises, which often leads to arguments between suppliers and buyers.
